Interface ConfigurationDataAccess

  • All Known Implementing Classes:

    public interface ConfigurationDataAccess

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean addConfiguration(fr.ubo.fast.common.model.Configuration configuration)
      Add a configuration defined by its aggregation type, interval, table name and time series ID.
      boolean deleteConfiguration(int time_series_id)
      Delete a configuration and automatically drop the associated aggregation tables if they exist.
      boolean deleteConfiguration(int time_series_id, fr.ubo.fast.common.model.AggregationType aggregation_type)
      Delete a configuration and automatically drop the associated aggregation tables if they exist.

    • Method Detail

      • addConfiguration

        boolean addConfiguration(fr.ubo.fast.common.model.Configuration configuration)
        Add a configuration defined by its aggregation type, interval, table name and time series ID.
        Parameters:
        configuration - Configuration to be added.
        Returns:
        True if the configuration was created successfully, false otherwise.

      • deleteConfiguration

        boolean deleteConfiguration(int time_series_id)
        Delete a configuration and automatically drop the associated aggregation tables if they exist.
        Parameters:
        time_series_id - Time series ID of the configuration to delete.
        Returns:
        True if the configuration was dropped successfully, false otherwise.

      • deleteConfiguration

        boolean deleteConfiguration(int time_series_id,
                            fr.ubo.fast.common.model.AggregationType aggregation_type)
        Delete a configuration and automatically drop the associated aggregation tables if they exist.
        Parameters:
        time_series_id - Time series ID of the configuration to delete.
        aggregation_type - Aggregation type of the configuration to delete.
        Returns:
        True if the configuration was dropped successfully, false otherwise.
